name: 350 W 42nd St Unit APT 45G
description: About 350 W 42nd St New York, NY 10036 Discover elegant living in this customized corner apartment nestled within The Orion on the 45th floor. A bright and modern home awaits with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and an open-concept layout where floor-to-ceiling, south facing windows embrace sweeping, open views of the Hudson River and the twinkling city skyline. The open kitchen is beautifully appointed with a suite of stainless steel appliances, wood cabinetry, and an island with a 10’ slab of granite. In the bathrooms, limestone and Waterworks fixtures are on show along with a deep soaking tub and double sinks in the master bath. All of the closets have been custom fitted and there is also a laundry area with a washer and dryer as well as built-in surround sound for entertaining. Voted one of the top amenity and service buildings in NYC, you will have access to two spacious lounges, located on the 29th and 31st floors, complete with spectacular views, conference rooms, billiards and foosball tables. These dazzling entertaining spaces are also available for private events, movie screenings or social and work events. High above Manhattan on the 30th floor, residents can also enjoy complimentary membership at La Palestra Gym, an 8,000 square foot state-of-the-art fitness center featuring a swimming pool, Jacuzzi and sauna. There are also two large outdoor sun decks on the 29th and 30th floors. The Orion, centrally located in Manhattan, is close to the Theater District, dining and entertainment, and is convenient to numerous subway lines; 1, 2, 3, N, R, Q, A, C, E, 7, and Shuttle trains. 350 W 42nd St is a condo located in Manhattan County, the 10036 ZIP Code, and the New York City Geographic District # 2 attendance zone.

name: 1 West End Ave
description: About 1 West End Ave New York, NY 10023 Property Overview - This generous fully furnished 2,835 square-foot corner four bedroom, four-and-a-half bath residence designed by Jeffrey Beers is wrapped in floor-to-ceiling windows showcasing spectacular river and city views to the south and west.A rich walnut residential entrance door complemented by a brushed bronze newspaper box and Nanz hardware invites one into a welcoming foyer and the exceptionally finished space featuring 11' 3 ceilings and seven-and-a-half-inch wide walnut plank flooring throughout. The Italian-crafted Scavolini kitchen - custom-designed by Jeffrey Beers is open to the corner living room and outfitted with light-stained walnut cabinetry accented by white matte glass panels. Marble slab countertops and backsplash, polished chrome fixtures by Dornbracht and a full suite of integrated professional appliances by Wolf, Miele and Sub-Zero, as well as a Gaggenau wine refrigerator, beautifully finish the space. The south-facing corner master bedroom features two oversized walk-in closets and a luxurious en-suite five-fixture master bath complete with radiant heated Bianco Dolomiti marble floors, brushed limestone walls, marble slab countertop, Dornbracht fixtures, glass enclosed shower and Zuma soaking tub. Three en-suite secondary baths are clad in Opal White marble floors and walls with Dornbracht fixtures and custom-stained oak vanities with Lacava countertops. A laundry room, walk-in foyer closet, and powder room featuring a Calacatta Fabricotti custom vanity with carved stone sink, Eramosa marble floor and herringbone inlay accent wall complete this exquisitely-designed residence.One West End, a sculptural glass residential tower with exterior architecture by Pelli Clarke Pelli, rises elegantly above Riverside Center - Atelier Christian de Portzamparc's master-planned neighborhood enclave. Featuring interiors designed by hospitality visionary Jeffrey Beers, the 42-story condominium offers 246 one-to-four bedroom residences including a curated collection of Penthouse and Tower Duplex homes.Commanding a full city block between 59th and 60th Streets at West End Avenue, One West End is home to expansive indoor and outdoor resort-inspired amenities including a 75-foot swimming pool within a double-height cantilevered atrium, a private fitness center and spa, and a 12,000 square foot terrace featuring cabanas, lush green spaces and areas for grilling and outdoor entertaining. Additional grandly-scaled amenity spaces include a living room with fireplace, media, billiards and game rooms, a children's playroom overlooking the garden terrace and a private dining room with chef's demonstration kitchen. On-site parking and resident storage are also available. 1 West End Ave is a condo located in Manhattan County, the 10023 ZIP Code, and the New York City Geographic District # 3 attendance zone. name: 25 Columbus Cir Unit 75CE
description: About 25 Columbus Cir New York, NY 10019 This dramatic penthouse is located high above Central Park on the 75th floor of Deutsche Bank Center at 25 Columbus Circle. Encompassing 4540 ft.Â² with 180Â° views from floor to ceiling windows and ceiling heights up to 14'. The PH offers jet liner views of the entire city including sweeping views of Central Park,The Chrysler building, Atlantic Ocean and Statue of Liberty facing west over to Hudson River. A 28' gallery leads to a 40' Living Room and Dining Room high above Central Park with mesmerizing views of Manhattan. Adjacent to the FDR is a 35' fully equipped chefs eat in kitchen that can be opened to the expansive entertaining space or closed off for more intimate dining. Also on Central Park is a grand primary suite that includes two large marble bathrooms,a dressing area and walk in closet. The penthouse features five bedrooms all with en suite baths, a wood paneled Library and baronial media room/family room with panoramic river and city views. There is a laundry room/kitchen as well. The entire apartment is run by a state of the art Crestron System, CAC, auto shades and music. There is tremendous closet space throughout, herringbone floors and a well appointed powder room. The 5-star condominium offers amenities on the 51st floor (Club 51) including a private screening room, state-of-the-art gym, private party space, children's playroom, private massage room and outdoor terrace. In house parking and pets allowed. As a resident, you have full access to The Mandarin Oriental Hotel amenities. Enjoy the signature Zen-like spa,state-of-the-art-fitness center, and the 75-foot indoor pool.Direct access to the retail offering first class dining experiences, Whole Foods Market and world famous shopping. Building Description: Deutsche Bank Center (also One Columbus Circle and formerly Time Warner Center) is a mixed-use building on Columbus Circle in Manhattan, New York City. It was developed by The Related Companies and Apollo Global Management, and designed by David Childs and Mustafa Kemal Abadan of Skidmore, Owings & Merrill. On the 20th floor, the massive almost 700 sq ft great room is the perfect spot to relax or entertain! Here you will find plenty of room for living and dining with tons of natural light from the wall of east facing windows! The kitchen features top of the line appliances - including wine fridge, Viking fridge/freezer, Viking stove, and Miele dishwasher. Also on the main level, a secondary primary suite with dressing area and 5 fixture bath can be found. Upstairs on the 21st floor, the top floor of The Plaza, you are greeted by the spacious landing which separates the 2 additional bedrooms and gives access to the private terrace. The primary bedroom suite is outfitted with a custom dressing room and closets, wood-burning fireplace, and a large en-suite 5 fixture windowed marble bathroom - the perfect sanctuary to start or end your day! The 400 sq ft terrace can be accessed from both upstairs bedrooms and the landing - making it convenient for guests any time of day to enjoy some fresh air and the views. The legendary Plaza offers a prestigious lifestyle at the premier Manhattan address. This world-class structure was built in 1905 by Henry J. Hardenberg resembling a French Renaissance Chateau, and is a Historic National Landmark that has been called home by some of New York's most elite. The Plaza residences enjoy hotel-style services and amenities, from concierge and butler service to 24-hour in-room dining, twice-daily housekeeping, plus access to The Palm Court, Plaza Food Hall, Champagne Bar, Rose Club, Warren-Tricomi Salon, Grand Ballroom, Terrace Room, and luxury retail shops. Experience Manhattan's premier living destination, steps from Central Park, glamorous Fifth Avenue shopping, internationally-acclaimed fine dining, and the best of New York City 1414 6th Ave is a condo located in Manhattan County, the 10019 ZIP Code, and the New York City Geographic District # 3 attendance zone.

name: 25 Columbus Cir
description: About 25 Columbus Cir New York, NY 10019 Deutsche Bank Center A spectacular renovated 2,942 square feet. FURNISHED 4-bedroom home located high above Central Park at The Deutsche Bank Center. The apartment was beautifully decorated by Hirsch Bender Associates, and is available furnished and offers soaring 12'4 ft. ceilings. Jet linear views from over 65 feet on Central Park with floor to ceiling windows including views of the Statue of Liberty, George Washington Bridge and vast vistas of Central Park to the Atlantic Ocean. A grand gallery leads to an enormous living room and dining room on Central Park with a cove and silver leaf ceilings with beautiful wood paneling. An adjacent well-appointed eat-in-kitchen featuring statutory white marble flooring and counters, top of the line stainless steel Miele appliances, two subzero refrigerators and freezers, wooden cabinetry, wine cooler and a washer dryer. Located directly on Central Park is a grand primary suite with double exposures East and South and spectacular city and Central Park South views. The primary bedroom has numerous walk-in closets and windowed five fixture marble master bath including steam shower, soaking tub and separate water closet. Adjacent to the primary bedroom on Central Park is a secondary bedroom with en-suite marble bath and fitted closets. A completely separate wing of the apartment facing South with views of the Hudson River and the Statue of Liberty offers two more bedrooms. Both bedrooms have en-suite baths and fitted closets. The home is fully motorized with auto shades, sheers and lighting along with a state-of-the-art entertainment system. The 5-star condominium offers amenities on the 51st floor (CLUB 51) including a private screening room, state-of-the-art gym, private party space, children’s playroom, private massage room and outdoor terrace. In house parking and pets allowed. As a resident, you have full access to The Mandarin Oriental Hotel, New York amenities. Enjoy the signature Zen-like spa, state-of-the-art-fitness center, and the 75-foot indoor pool. The Restaurant and Bar Collection offers Michelin-starred restaurants with world-class chefs, providing breakfast, brunch, lunch, dinner, light bites and cocktails. Residents can experience these truly memorable culinary and dining experiences. Direct access to the retail offering, first class dining experiences, Whole Foods Market and world-famous shopping. The Deutsche Bank Center is the epicenter of New York City and Columbus Circle is a thriving, unrivaled destination for the best shopping, dining, culture, entertainment, and parks in New York City. Building Description: Deutsche Bank Center (also One Columbus Circle and formerly Time Warner Center) is a mixed-use building on Columbus Circle in Manhattan, New York City. It was developed by The Related Companies and Apollo Global Management, and designed by David Childs and Mustafa Kemal Abadan of Skidmore, Owings & Merrill. Deutsche Bank Center consists of two 750-foot (230 m) two towers bridged by a multi-story atrium containing upscale retail shops. The building also contains office and residential tenants. The total floor area of 2.8 million square feet (260,000 m2) is occupied by office space, including the Residences Mandain Oriental condominiums; the Mandarin Oriental hotel; and Jazz at Lincoln Center. The Shops at Columbus Circle is an upscale shopping mall located in a curving arcade at the base of the building, with a large Whole Foods Market grocery store on the lower level.
